title.narrative: Global Network for Disaster Reduction Summit

description.narrative: The Civil Society Global Summit for Disaster Risk Reduction will bring together civil society groups form all over the world, including representatives from the Pacific to discuss how they can make an effective contribution to implementation of the Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction (2015-2030), the global blueprint for disaster risk reduction. The purpose of the Summit is to identify opportunities for collaboration to improve local resilience to support the deliverables of the Sendai Framework; to establish the Global Network for Disaster Reduction (GNDR) Strategic Plan 2016-2020; and to develop regional and national contextualisation of the GNDR Strategy 2016-2020. The 2016 Global Summit will be held in Bangkok on 18-21 April 2016.
